column4: it does not generate a conf. you can use tools like xrandr and look at the Xorg.0.log
the overlay is the resize overlay. you are close to the edge of the screen so it is indicating it will resize to full size. does it not go away
if you see me exit again, thats why :( any ideas on how to cancel it
not really. you could look into !ccsm and see if something there might be causing problems
